definition: to make life difficult for/to embarrass/unable to make it through
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)

sentences.english: Why do you always speak evil things of me and not good?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼你總是對我過不去，說惡不說好？

sentences.english: When somebody chooses you…We talked about this. You stand up. You be a man.
sentences.chinese: 有人跟你過不去，你要面對他，要像個男人。

sentences.english: Everything has been going wrong today.
sentences.chinese: 今天似乎每件事都跟我過不去。

sentences.english: The road was too narrow for cars to pass.
sentences.chinese: 這條路太窄，車子過不去。

sentences.english: The farrier, a small man with a sharp face, always enjoyed disagreeing with the butcher.
sentences.chinese: 長着尖臉的小個子馬掌匠最愛和屠戶過不去。

sentences.english: They had difficulties with the people of the country and with the law.
sentences.chinese: 他們是同這個國家的人民和法律過不去。

sentences.english: Some politicians seem to have it in for the environment these days.
sentences.chinese: 近來，一些政客們似乎總是和環境過不去。

sentences.english: Everything allows nature to take its course, the senior general demeanor, do not not be able to pass with oneself.
sentences.chinese: 凡事順其自然，大將風度，不要跟自己過不去。

sentences.english: I promised not to go there.
I'm not saying this to disparage kids.
sentences.chinese: 我這麼說並非和孩子們過不去。

sentences.english: You shouldn't worry about the present either. There is no river that can't be crossed.
sentences.chinese: 你對目前的申請別犯愁，沒有過不去的河嘛。

sentences.english: John's pals were giving him a hard time about his girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 約翰的朋友們因爲他的女朋友而和他過不去。

sentences.english: because it's, otherwise not really doable.
Way on the face very hard time, but also hard support.
sentences.chinese: 路子面子上很過不去，卻還硬撐着。

sentences.english: The road is too narrow for the truck to pass.
sentences.chinese: 路太窄了，卡車過不去了。
